channel.title: [PI] Autocasting bug

item.title: [PI] Autocasting bug
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Okay ive noticed that users are aloud to autocast ancients and still have the modern mage book open , how do i make it so that if you are autocasting with ancient staff that it checks that you have the ancient mage book open.

heres my case:

[code]if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15050)
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
else
c.sendMessage(“You can’t autocast ancients without an ancient staff.”);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

			}		
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
